ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups White Lily® Enriched Bleached Self-Rising Flour or White Lily® Enriched Unbleached Self-Rising Flour

cookingTips: Keep all ingredients cold for tender, flaky biscuits with high rise
Handle dough minimally and use a gentle touch when cutting out biscuits
Brush with melted butter immediately after baking for a golden, buttery finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the secret to achieving light, fluffy biscuits with a tender crumb using self-rising flour?
